## Fields

<ParamField path="persona_id" type="str" required>
  ID of the created persona
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="status" type="str" required>
  Status of the persona (active, closed)
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="first_name" type="str" required>
  First name of the persona
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="last_name" type="str" required>
  Last name of the persona
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="email" type="str" required>
  Email of the persona
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="vault_id" type="UnionType[str, None]" required>
  ID of the vault
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="phone_number" type="UnionType[str, None]" required>
  Phone number of the persona (optional)
</ParamField>

`notte_sdk.types`
